abstract: Sinochem, the state-run parent of China’s largest fertilizer distributor, has hired Deutsche Bank and Citigroup to advise it on an acquisition of a stake in Potash Corp. of Saskatchewan, two people with direct knowledge of the matter said Wednesday.
snippet: Sinochem, the state-run parent of China’s largest fertilizer distributor, has hired Deutsche Bank and Citigroup to advise it on an acquisition of a stake in Potash Corp. of Saskatchewan, two people with direct knowledge of the matter said Wednesda...
lead_paragraph: Sinochem, the state-run parent of China’s largest fertilizer distributor, has hired Deutsche Bank and Citigroup to advise it on an acquisition of a stake in the Potash Corporation of Saskatchewan, two people with direct knowledge of the matter told DealBook on Wednesday.

headline.main: Sinochem Said to Seek Advice on Buying a Stake in Potash
